<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Limited">
[Sudden Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=639)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 79

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** 1 creature or object
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** 
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You call down a small bolt of lightning on the target, dealing 4d12 electricity damage.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d12.
